meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Allison Standish Chris Stallings Ron White Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4009.

td.p: Allison Standish, a law student from Austin, Texas
Chris Stallings, a science teacher from Carmel, California
Ron White, a network engineer from Cary, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,001)

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
MOVEMENTS
DISNEY MOVIES
THE QUOTABLE REAGAN
TRILOBITES
"OUCH"!

Chris
